backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile creation, update, retrieval, and authorization using AccessControl and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps for deploying PlayPal to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with PWA metadata, manifest, and PlayPal branding.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining PlayPal name, icons, theme colors, and metadata.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching, versioning, precaching, and network-first fetch strategy.
frontend/scripts/mainnet-redeploy.sh: Bash script automating clean install, build, and mainnet deployment steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile gating, and rendering login, setup, or main app shell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides main app layout with screen switching and a bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Displays a profile card with photo, stats, badges, and availability info.
Renders select inputs to filter discovery results by category and zone.
frontend/src/components/LevelStars.tsx: Shows a 1â€“5 star rating based on the user's level.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles image selection and upload with progress tracking for profile photos.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user photo or a fallback icon if none exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains react-query hooks for profiles, photo uploads, and discovery candidates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: Swipe-style candidate discovery screen with local filters, card navigation, and like/pass handling.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form UI to edit an existing user profile and submit updates via mutation.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, tagline, and UI buttons for login or account creation.
frontend/src/screens/MatchesScreen.tsx: Empty placeholder file for matches screen.
Empty placeholder file for match profile screen.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Displays the user's profile with stats, photo, and an option to switch to edit mode.
Initial profile creation form collecting user details and submitting them to the backend.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings page providing logout functionality and basic app information.
frontend/src/utils/discoverFilterMapping: Defines static category options for min/max discovery filters.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Utility functions to map levels and positions to numeric or Spanish-language equivalents.
frontend/src/utils/startupPerf.ts: Empty placeholder for startup performance utilities.
frontend/src/utils/unreadMessagesStore.t: Empty placeholder for unread messages store.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/uruguayDepartments.ts: Exports a fixed list of Uruguay departments plus an 'all departments' label for zone filtering.
frontend/src/utils/zoneFilterMappings.ts: Empty file placeholder for zone filter mappings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for styling.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for updating Discover filter UI.
